post.author: NX-317
post.body:
I'm making new singleplayer map for Prey. Its name is "Surprisingly Focused".

Screenshots:

http://img151.imageshack.us/img151/4906/sfentranceza8.jpg
http://img151.imageshack.us/img151/1586/sftommyghostroomjd5.jpg
http://img87.imageshack.us/img87/6440/sfact2entranceux3.jpg

edit: replaced the third screenshot, because it was too dark. Thanks for pointing this.

Of course the map will feature gravity volumes, wallwalks, and maybe even a planet or two...

I also plan to make MP version of this map.

Feedback, constructive criticism and advice are welcome.

post.author: Ww3
post.body: Light it up some more, it's darker than Doom3

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: i agree. the 1st screen looks nice but the others are to dark for my tastes.

post.author: mavrik65
post.body: I like the organic look the walls. Also I thought the living weapons were a great idea and the gravity puzzles were both inventive and mind blowing. All in all prey's a good game just don't expect intense first person action. A compelling story, gravity manipulation and great level design are were the games strong points lie.

post.author: der_ton
post.body:
I'll download and play any Prey SP map. I hope it will also have portals, they are missing from your announced feature list...
The screenshots look good.

post.author: NX-317
post.body: It has portals, I simply forgot to mention them.

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body: Best line in Prey: "It's dark in here. I'm Doomed."
